translation: Happy are the Kshatriyas, O Arjuna! who are called to fight in such a battle that comes of its own accord as an open door to heaven.
commentary: 2.32 by chance of itself? f and? Uppannam come? Swargadvaram the gate of heaven? uncovered opened? Sukhinah happy? Kshatriyas Kshatriyas? Partha O Partha? get obtain? battle battle? Eedrishm such.Commentary Do the scriptures declare that if a Kshatriya dies for a righteous cause on the battlefield? he at once goes to heaven.
